print(dataset.head())
Listing 16.3: Example of loading and summarizing the dataset.
Next, we can mark all missing values indicated with a ‘?’ character with a NaN value, which
is a ﬂoat. This will allow us to work with the data as one array of ﬂoating point values rather
than mixed types, which is less eﬃcient.
# mark all missing values
dataset.replace(' ?' , nan, inplace=True)
Listing 16.4: Example of replacing missing values with NaN.
